lead_paragraph: BROWN--Roscoe. The Wildlife Conservation Society mourns the death of esteemed educator and WWII hero Dr. Roscoe Brown. Roscoe will be remembered as an educational leader in New York and as a member of the famed Tuskegee Airmen, where he was a former squadron commander of the 100th Fighter Squadron of the 332nd Fighter Group. Roscoe served as a WCS Trustee from 1990-2000 and became an Honorary Trustee in 2000. WCS is grateful for his support and commitment to conservation. We extend our heartfelt condolences to Roscoe's family, friends, and colleagues. 1/3
